rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3420, 3421, 3422, M5017, M6025}

description: This unit will describe and demonstrate the complexity of data management and statistical computing methods. It will enable students to communicate effectively about the issues in storing and retrieving information, and in assessing the quality and limitations of data repositories. It uses examples from real data sets to give students practical skills in data management, assessment of data quality and handling and linking of large volumes of data.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
